recipes.title: Boiled Chicken
recipes.instructions: Place chicken in water with salt. Simmer for 20 minutes.

recipes.title: Boiled Duck
recipes.instructions: Boil duck in water for 20 minutes. Take it out, serve.

recipes.title: Cereal
recipes.instructions: Add cereal to milk. Mix well

recipes.title: Boiled Egg
recipes.instructions: Place egg in boiling water. Remove after 3 mins.

recipes.title: Instant Coffee
recipes.instructions: Add instant coffee powder to hot water. Stir well.
